Others: Tyrese Maxey will be out for a couple of weeks with a right hamstring injury, setting the stage for rookie Jared McCain to take on a larger role.
McCain came off the bench once again, tallying 23 points, three rebounds and two assists.
Despite his efforts, the Knicks secured a 111-99 victory.
Joel Embiid made his season debut, contributing 13 points, five assists and three rebounds in 26 minutes.
Paul George led the 76ers with 29 points and 10 rebounds.

The Knicks had six players in double figures, with OG Anunoby scoring 24, Karl-Anthony Towns adding 21 points and 13 rebounds and Josh Hart posting a triple-double with 14 points, 12 rebounds and 10 assists.
